alert.note: Alert for Bay; Calhoun; Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 12 at 5:10AM EDT until October 12 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 AM CDT/715 AM EDT/ THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Panhandle Florida, including the following counties, Bay, Calhoun and Gulf. * WHEN...Until 615 AM CDT /715 AM EDT/. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 409 AM CDT /509 AM EDT/, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1.5 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Callaway, Springfield, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, Wetappo, Allanton and Chipola Park. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
